text.tspan: A recent study published in Science claims that CO2 emissions
are directly involved in rising temperatures
The United States is a federal presidential
constitutional republic. As president, you have
a limited authority, which you share with Congress.
If your decisions are putting the country at risk,
Congress might start making their own choices.
As a democratic nation, your citizens are generally
less prone to unrest. However, you don't have as much
So it turns out those climate change guys were right.
Choose a region and try everything you can to keep it
together despite overwhelming odds. You will have to
manage your economy, social stability & industrial sector
while making as much progress as you can towards
It won't be easy, and sacrifices must be made.
"Not one would mind, neither bird nor tree
